reviewText: I liked this video because it was very concrete and demonstrated the principles being discussed. I also liked that Christopher sat down and talked you through all the ideas.  I intend to use this approach in my new house.

This man is a superstar as far as designers go.  He cut his teeth on doing stage sets where you have little to work with and have to make a superb image!  Love his ideas, expertise and teaching skill.
This product was not in good shape. It was used and not in good shape.  Very disappointed in the product.

I am a person who has to see things to learn.  This was a great dvd and i also come back and watch it again.  I enjoy Christoper Lowell anyway so I thought this was a great video to explain visually what the book tells you.
